# Rockwell Automation (Allen-Bradley) EtherNet/IP Implementation

## Overview

Rockwell Automation is a major vendor of EtherNet/IP devices, particularly Allen-Bradley controllers and I/O modules.

## Vendor Information

- **Vendor ID:** 0x0001 (Rockwell Automation)
- **Common Products:** ControlLogix, CompactLogix, MicroLogix, Point I/O, Flex I/O
- **Documentation:** Rockwell Automation EtherNet/IP documentation
